Package org.magicdgs.readtools.utils.read.transformer.trimming

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApplyTrimResultReadTransformer
    ReadTransformer for hard-clipping ("cut") reads based on the trimming flags (ReservedTags.ct, ReservedTags.ts, ReservedTags.te).
    CutReadTrimmer
    Crops a concrete number of bases in one or both sides of the read.
    MottQualityTrimmer
    Trims low quality ends by computing quality drops under a certain threshold using a modified version of the Mott's algorithm..
    TrailingNtrimmer
    Trims trailing Ns (unknown bases) in the read sequence, in one or both sides.
    TrimmingFunction
    Trimming function is a especial ReadTransformer that updates in-place the trimming tags on a read passed to it.
